text:

flavor: A mother of plants in mother of pearl.

flavor: Burrowing may not be for everyone, but I dig it.

random enemy minion.

less damage.

flavor: Someone didn’t realize the ‘cold, black heart’ thing was supposed to be a metaphor.

flavor: You’ve got it wrong. She releases ink when you’re scared.
name: Inkveil Ambusher

flavor: Wake up! No sleeping in with the fishes!
name: Herald of Light

flavor: He didn't have time to Myrmidon the other half of his armor before combat started.

flavor: You merely adopted the Battlegrounds. I was born in it. Molded by it.

flavor: "You can have these back when you learn to play nice."

flavor: No Old Gods or Kings, only Naga.

flavor: Praise Lord Helix!
name: Fossil Fanatic

flavor: They used to be called the Heralds of Order before all of this silly Sundering nonsense.

flavor: Time for some out of this world RNG.
name: Submerged Spacerock
text: [x]Deathrattle: Add two Arcane Mage spells to your hand. They are Temporary.

flavor: Talk about an identity crisis.
name: Lady Naz'jar
text:
[x]While in your hand, this

text: [x]Battlecry: Give all Battlecry minions in your deck +1/+1.

flavor: Deathrattle: You'll be octo-sorry.
name: Ozumat

flavor: Neptulon, tired of filling hands, is now throwing hands.

flavor: Prefers regular over diet shampoo.

flavor: Lava shark, doo doo doo doo doo doo.

flavor: Don’t let this distract you from the fact that in 1998, Ozumat threw Neptulon off Shell in a Cell, and plummeted 16 fathoms through an announcer’s table.
name: Clash of the Colossals
text: Add a random Colossal minion to both players' hands. Yours costs (2) less.

flavor: A big minion that clears the board and gains Armor? Wow, Warrior is really in their element now.

flavor: “IT’S NOT A PHASE, MOM!”
name: Herald of Shadows

flavor: "Well if you cared about those cards so much, why didn't you play them?"

Light every card in the opponent's hand on fire. In 3 turns, any still
in hand are destroyed!

flavor: How do you know when someone has a crush on you? They take your breath away.
name: Coilfang Constrictor

Add two random
spells from other classes
that cost (5) or more
to your hand.

[x]Summon a minion
from each player's deck.
Repeat until either side
of the battlefield is full.

flavor: A Naval Mine? I'd rather it be Naval Yours.

flavor: Be careful what you fish for.

text: [x]Taunt. Battlecry: If you've cast three spells while holding this, summon two   copies of this.@ ({0} left!)@ (Ready!)

One Fish, Two Fish.
Less Fish? You wish.

The pelican’s beak is so big, some Colossal minions can even fit inside!*

flavor: This here is Carl. They're in charge of these elementals. Not all of them get along, so sometimes Carl corrals the quarreling coral.
name: Coral Keeper

flavor: Before setting her sights on exploration, Ini was known for many inventions, such as the airborne breadmaking dirigible, the hypersprocket 200X zoom binoculars, and jobes (jean robes).

[x]Deal $4 damage to a minion.

flavor: For some, the Sundering was the collapse of civilization. For others, it was a great core workout.
name: Azsharan Sentinel
text: [x]Taunt. Deathrattle: Put a 'Sunken Sentinel' on the bottom of your deck.

flavor:
The Naga devised the perfect retaliation to any pirates
dropping anchor in their domain: vandalism.
name: Anchored Totem
text: After you summon a 1-Cost minion, give it +2/+1.

flavor: The perfect card for Spell Damage Shaman and Spelling Bee Shaman.
name: Bioluminescence
text: Give your minions Spell Damage +1.

flavor: Often followed up with a chasmic handshake.
name: Abyssal Wave
text:
[x]Deal $4 damage to
all minions. Give your
opponent an Abyssal
Curse.

flavor: I can't... *mrgglrg* understand... *mrgrllrg* your accent. *mrgrlrglr*
name: Rock Bottom
text: [x]Summon a 1/1 Murloc, then Dredge. If it's also a Murloc, summon one more.

flavor: Is a sucker for small talk.
name: Smothering Starfish
text: Battlecry: Silence ALL other minions.

flavor: That's not what I meant when I asked you to water the garden.
name: Azsharan Gardens
text: Give all minions in your hand +1/+1. Put a 'Sunken Gardens' on the bottom of your deck.

flavor: Honestly, I feel less secure when it's around.
name: Security Automaton
text: After you summon a Mech, gain +1/+1.

flavor: DO A BARREL ROLL!
name: Emergency Maneuvers
text: Secret: When a friendly minion dies, summon a copy of it. It's Dormant for 1 turn.

flavor: Fish are friends, not food! Gilgoblins on the other hand…
name: Blood in the Water
text: Deal $3 damage to an enemy. Summon a 5/5 Shark with Rush.

flavor: Part of the deck, part of the crew.
name: Bootstrap Sunkeneer
targetingArrowText: Put an enemy minion on bottom of deck.
text: [x]Combo: Put an enemy minion on the bottom of  your opponent's deck.

flavor: You win some, you ransom.
name: Pirate Admiral Hooktusk
text: Battlecry: If you've summoned 7 other Pirates this game, plunder the enemy!0 ({0} left!)0 (Ready!)

flavor: Keeps any ancient book it finds all to its shelf.
name: Selfish Shellfish
text: Deathrattle: Your opponent draws 2 cards.

flavor: If you play your cards fast enough, who's to say how much they cost?
name: Swiftscale Trickster
text: Battlecry: Your next spell this turn costs (0).

flavor: This giant crab loves to sink entire naval fleets, but it'll settle for a single dinghy in a pinch.
name: Crabatoa
text: Colossal +2 Your Crabatoa Claws have +2 Attack.

flavor: The real treasure was the Naga we met along the way.
name: Treasure Guard
text: [x]Taunt Deathrattle: Draw a card.

flavor: Don't worry, your wounds are self-cauterizing!
name: Forged in Flame
text: Destroy your weapon, then draw cards equal to its Attack.

flavor: "This is why I'm afraid of the deep end of the pool."
name: From the Depths
text: [x]Reduce the Cost of the bottom five cards in your  deck by (3), then Dredge.

flavor: At thousands of feet below the surface, it's a pretty high-pressure job.
name: Guard the City
text: Gain 3 Armor. Summon a 2/3 Naga with Taunt.

flavor: Was able to produce more effective weapons than his predecessor, Kelpsmith.
name: Obsidiansmith
text: [x]Battlecry: Dredge. If it's a minion or a weapon, give it +1/+1.

flavor: This is your brain on Azerite.
name: Lady Ashvane
text: Battlecry: Give all weapons in your hand, deck, and battlefield +1/+1.

flavor: One heck of a hot tub.
name: The Fires of Zin-Azshari
text: Replace your deck with minions that cost (5) or more. They cost (5).

flavor: Even in ancient times, the Night Elves were committed cat people.
name: Azsharan Saber
text: [x]Rush. Deathrattle: Put a 'Sunken Saber' on the bottom of your deck.

flavor: I shouldn't have licked that.
name: Urchin Spines
text: Your spells this turn are Poisonous.

flavor: Lionfish, Naga, and Spears, oh my!
name: Naga's Pride
text: Summon two 2/2 Lionfish. If you played a Naga while holding this, give them +1/+1.

flavor:
Barber: What do you want?
Naga: You ever have a thirst for arcane power?
Barber: Say no more.
name: Gifts of Azshara
text: Draw a card. If you played a Naga while holding this, do it again.

flavor: Deep beneath the waves, this hydra grew to incredible size based on a steady diet of literally anything that crossed its path.
name: Hydralodon
text: [x]Colossal +2 Battlecry: Give your  Hydralodon Heads Rush.

flavor: If you use all 10 mana, that's called the 'Lunch Special.'
name: Holy Maki Roll
text: Restore #2 Health. Repeatable this turn.

flavor: "Sira'kess, she's the best! Puts her followers to the test.
name: Sira'kess Cultist
text: Battlecry: Give your opponent an Abyssal Curse.

flavor: I know this is a frustrating situation you’re in, Captain, but there’s no need to curse.
name: Dragged Below
text:
[x]Deal $4 damage
to a minion.
Give your opponent
an Abyssal Curse.

flavor: Time to go in for the krill.
name: Chum Bucket
text:
[x]Give all Murlocs in your
hand +1/+1. Repeat for
each Murloc you control.

flavor: Everything’s going exzaq’ully to plan.
name: Za'qul
text: [x]Your Abyssal Curses heal you for the damage they deal. Battlecry: Give your opponent an Abyssal Curse.

flavor: They call him Murloc Joe, winner of the Big M Memorial Surf Off Competition.
name: Twin-fin Fin Twin
text: Rush. Battlecry: Summon a copy of this.

flavor: How much storage does Gigafin's Maw have? About a giga bite.
name: Gigafin
text: [x]Colossal +1. Battlecry: Devour all enemy minions. Deathrattle: Spit them back out.

flavor: "What do you mean this isn't the meal you asked for? ! I made you a Fillet Minion!"
name: Filletfighter
text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage.
